# Silver Run (Delaware Bay tributary)

Silver Run is a  long tributary to Delaware Bay in New Castle County, Delaware.  Silver Run is tidal for most of its course and drains a large part of Augustine Wildlife Area.
See also
*List of Delaware rivers
References
External links
*[https://web.archive.org/web/20190729030350/http://www.dnrec.delaware.gov/fw/Hunting/Documents/WMA%202019/Augustine%20Silver%20Run%20Green.pdf Silver Run Tract of Augustine Wildlife Area]
